title: The Golden age of the automobile
creator_credit: Helen Jean Secondari and John H. Secondari
brief_description: Traces the history of the automobile from its early years as a plaything of the rich, through Henry Ford’s development of the Model T for the average worker, to the present day when its proliferation has altered the face of the western world. Suitable for upper primary and secondary level.
